thread.title: This Is Us: If You Like the Show, You'll Love the Soundtrack
thread.title_full: This Is Us: If You Like the Show, You'll Love the Soundtrack

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: This Is Us: If You Like the Show, You'll Love the Soundtrack
text:
This Is Us Season 1 Music This Is Us: If You Like the Show, You'll Love the Soundtrack March 14, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 This Is Us: If You Like the Show, You'll Love the Soundtrack 
We've fallen deeply, truly, and madly in love with This Is Us . The characters are relatable, the acting is on point, and the twists just keep coming. One of the best things about NBC's show, however, is how seamlessly it integrates music from both eras in which it takes place. The first half of season one has included great songs, and we've compiled them here for you. Fair warning that just hearing the music might make you cry , but if you're willing to take your chances, it's worth it.
